mapper.select: SELECT PK_STAFF_ID, STAFF_NAME, FK_DEPT_ID, FK_POSITION_ID, FK_DEPT_ID, T_OUTFIT_DEPT.DEPT_NAME AS deptName, T_DICTIONARY_POSITION.POSITION_NAME AS positionName FROM T_STAFF_INFO LEFT JOIN T_OUTFIT_DEPT ON T_OUTFIT_DEPT.PK_DEPT_ID = T_STAFF_INFO.FK_DEPT_ID LEFT JOIN T_DICTIONARY_POSITION ON T_DICTIONARY_POSITION.PK_POSITION_ID = T_STAFF_INFO.FK_POSITION_ID

SELECT T_STAFF_INFO.PK_STAFF_ID, T_STAFF_INFO.STAFF_NAME, T_STAFF_INFO.FK_DEPT_ID, T_OUTFIT_DEPT.DEPT_NAME, T_STAFF_INFO.FK_POSITION_ID, T_DICTIONARY_POSITION.POSITION_NAME FROM T_STAFF_INFO LEFT JOIN T_OUTFIT_DEPT on T_OUTFIT_DEPT.PK_DEPT_ID = T_STAFF_INFO.FK_DEPT_ID LEFT JOIN T_DICTIONARY_POSITION on T_DICTIONARY_POSITION.PK_POSITION_ID = T_STAFF_INFO.FK_POSITION_ID

SELECT T_STAFF_INFO.PK_STAFF_ID, T_STAFF_INFO.STAFF_NAME FROM T_STAFF_INFO WHERE T_STAFF_INFO.PK_STAFF_ID = ( SELECT DEPT_LEADER FROM T_OUTFIT_DEPT WHERE PK_DEPT_ID = ( SELECT FK_DEPT_ID FROM T_STAFF_INFO WHERE PK_STAFF_ID = #{pkStaffId}))
SELECT T_STAFF_INFO.PK_STAFF_ID, T_STAFF_INFO.STAFF_NAME FROM T_STAFF_INFO WHERE T_STAFF_INFO.FK_POSITION_ID = #{fkPositionId}

SELECT PK_STAFF_ID, STAFF_NAME, STAFF_SEX, STAFF_AGE, STAFF_STATUS, T_STAFF_INFO.FK_DEPT_ID, T_OUTFIT_DEPT.DEPT_NAME AS deptName, T_STAFF_INFO.FK_POSITION_ID, T_DICTIONARY_POSITION.POSITION_NAME AS positionName, T_STAFF_INFO.FK_WORKADDRESS_ID, T_OUTFIT_WORKADDRESS.WORKADRESS_NAME AS workAddressName, ENTRY_TIME, T_STAFF_INFO.FK_HTLX_ID, T_DICTIONARY_HTLX.CONTRAC_TYPE AS htlxName, RECRUIT_WAY, SYQDQ_TIME, ID_TYPE, ID_CARD, STAFF_EMAIL, STAFF_TEL, NATIVE_PLACE, BIRTHDAY, T_STAFF_INFO.FK_NATION_ID, T_DICTIONARY_NATION.NATION_NAME AS nationName, HKSZD, POLITIVAL_OUTLOOK, CURRENT_ADDRESS, IS_MARRY, T_STAFF_INFO.FK_EDUCATION_ID, T_DICTIONARY_EDUCATION.EDUCATION_NAME AS educationName, T_STAFF_INFO.ZGXLBYYX, T_STAFF_INFO.WY_DJ, T_STAFF_INFO.JSJ_DJ, T_STAFF_INFO.MAJOR, T_STAFF_INFO.BANK_NAME, T_STAFF_INFO.BANK_ID, T_STAFF_INFO.BRANCH_BANK, T_STAFF_INFO.SYR, T_STAFF_INFO.PICTURE_PATH, T_STAFF_INFO.HBLX_NAME1, T_STAFF_INFO.OBJECT1, T_STAFF_INFO.HBLX_NAME2, T_STAFF_INFO.OBJECT2, T_STAFF_INFO.HBLX_NAME3, T_STAFF_INFO.OBJECT3, T_STAFF_INFO.HBLX_NAME4, T_STAFF_INFO.OBJECT4, T_STAFF_INFO.HBLX_NAME5, T_STAFF_INFO.OBJECT5 FROM T_STAFF_INFO LEFT JOIN T_OUTFIT_DEPT ON T_STAFF_INFO.FK_DEPT_ID = T_OUTFIT_DEPT.PK_DEPT_ID LEFT JOIN T_DICTIONARY_POSITION ON T_STAFF_INFO.FK_POSITION_ID = T_DICTIONARY_POSITION.PK_POSITION_ID LEFT JOIN T_OUTFIT_WORKADDRESS ON T_OUTFIT_WORKADDRESS.PK_WORKADRESS_ID = T_STAFF_INFO.FK_WORKADDRESS_ID LEFT JOIN T_DICTIONARY_HTLX ON T_DICTIONARY_HTLX.PK_HTLX_ID = T_STAFF_INFO.FK_HTLX_ID LEFT JOIN T_DICTIONARY_NATION ON T_STAFF_INFO.FK_NATION_ID = T_DICTIONARY_NATION.PK_NATION_ID LEFT JOIN T_DICTIONARY_EDUCATION ON T_STAFF_INFO.FK_EDUCATION_ID = T_DICTIONARY_EDUCATION.PK_EDUCATION_ID where T_STAFF_INFO.ID_CARD = #{idcard}
SELECT T_STAFF_INFO.PK_STAFF_ID,T_STAFF_INFO.STAFF_NAME FROM T_STAFF_INFO WHERE PK_STAFF_ID NOT IN (SELECT DISTINCT(T_STAFF_SALARY.FK_STAFF_ID) FROM T_STAFF_SALARY)
SELECT T_STAFF_INFO.PK_STAFF_ID,T_STAFF_INFO.STAFF_NAME FROM T_STAFF_INFO WHERE PK_STAFF_ID NOT IN (SELECT DISTINCT(RE_GROUP_STAFF.FK_STAFF_ID) FROM RE_GROUP_STAFF)
select distinct (PK_STAFF_ID) from T_STAFF_INFO where FK_DEPT_ID = #{fkDeptId}
mapper.insert:
insert into T_STAFF_INFO
PK_STAFF_ID,
STAFF_NAME,
STAFF_SEX,
STAFF_AGE,
STAFF_STATUS,
FK_DEPT_ID,
FK_POSITION_ID,
FK_WORKADDRESS_ID,
ENTRY_TIME,
FK_HTLX_ID,
RECRUIT_WAY,
SYQDQ_TIME,
ID_TYPE,
ID_CARD,
STAFF_EMAIL,
STAFF_TEL,
NATIVE_PLACE,
BIRTHDAY,
FK_NATION_ID,
HKSZD,
POLITIVAL_OUTLOOK,
CURRENT_ADDRESS,
IS_MARRY,
FK_EDUCATION_ID,
ZGXLBYYX,
WY_DJ,
JSJ_DJ,
MAJOR,
BANK_NAME,
BANK_ID,
BRANCH_BANK,
SYR,
PICTURE_PATH,
HBLX_NAME1,
OBJECT1,
HBLX_NAME2,
OBJECT2,
HBLX_NAME3,
OBJECT3,
HBLX_NAME4,
OBJECT4,
HBLX_NAME5,
OBJECT5,

mapper.update:
update T_STAFF_INFO
STAFF_NAME = #{staffName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STAFF_SEX = #{staffSex,jdbcType=INTEGER},
STAFF_AGE = #{staffAge,jdbcType=INTEGER},
STAFF_STATUS = #{staffStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
FK_DEPT_ID = #{fkDeptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FK_POSITION_ID = #{fkPositionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FK_WORKADDRESS_ID = #{fkWorkaddressId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ENTRY_TIME = #{entryTime,jdbcType=DATE},
FK_HTLX_ID = #{fkHtlxId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RECRUIT_WAY = #{recruitWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SYQDQ_TIME = #{syqdqTime,jdbcType=DATE},
ID_TYPE = #{idType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ID_CARD = #{idCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STAFF_EMAIL = #{staffEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STAFF_TEL = #{staffTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NATIVE_PLACE = #{nativePlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BIRTHDAY = #{birthday,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FK_NATION_ID = #{fkNationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HKSZD = #{hkszd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
POLITIVAL_OUTLOOK = #{politivalOutlook,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CURRENT_ADDRESS = #{currentAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_MARRY = #{isMarry,jdbcType=INTEGER},
FK_EDUCATION_ID = #{fkEducationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZGXLBYYX = #{zgxlbyyx,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WY_DJ = #{wyDj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JSJ_DJ = #{jsjDj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MAJOR = #{major,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BANK_NAME = #{bankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BANK_ID = #{bankId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BRANCH_BANK = #{branchBank,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SYR = #{syr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PICTURE_PATH = #{picturePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HBLX_NAME1 = #{hblxName1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJECT1 = #{object1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HBLX_NAME2 = #{hblxName2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJECT2 = #{object2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HBLX_NAME3 = #{hblxName3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJECT3 = #{object3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HBLX_NAME4 = #{hblxName4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJECT4 = #{object4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HBLX_NAME5 = #{hblxName5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJECT5 = #{object5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where PK_STAFF_ID = #{pkStaffId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.delete: update T_STAFF_INFO set FK_DEPT_ID = null where FK_DEPT_ID= #{fkDeptId}
